entry.title: China's Jobless Don't Always Show Up in the Data. But They Show Up in the Library.
entry.content: Unemployed and afraid to tell their families, many Chinese people need a place to figure out their futures; for some, it’s the stacks.

entry.title: From Patriot Missiles to a Mother and Her Vintage Rifle: Inside Ukraine's Air Defense
entry.content: Defending against aerial threats has grown in importance, making Ukraine a test bed for a range of air-defense systems.

entry.title: Israeli Military Says It Is Close to Controlling Gaza's North
entry.content: The United Nations says the humanitarian crisis in Gaza is growing as Israel orders already displaced Palestinians to relocate again.

entry.title: Biden Convinced Netanyahu to Halt a Pre-Emptive Strike Against Hezbollah
entry.content: An urgent call illustrates Washington’s attempts to prevent a widening war in the Middle East.
